<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}

  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Import a YouTube playlist by URL or ID

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["playlistUrl"],"properties":{"playlistUrl":{"type":"string","description":"YouTube playlist URL or playlist ID","minLength":1,"maxLength":500}}}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
